summary:
The Security Council adopted Resolution 2224 (2015) on 9 June 2015, recalling previous relevant resolutions and the statement of its President of 29 March 2006. The Council:

1. Extended the mandate of the Panel of Experts, as specified in paragraph 29 of resolution 1929 (2010), until 9 July 2016 and intends to review the mandate by 9 June 2016.

2. Requested the Panel to provide a midterm report to the Committee by 9 November 2015 and to the Council by 9 December 2015, and a final report to the Committee by 9 May 2016 and to the Council by 9 June 2016.

3. Requested the Panel to provide a planned program of work to the Committee within thirty days and to provide updates to the program.

4. Expressed its intent to follow the work of the Panel.

5. Urged all States, UN bodies, and other parties to cooperate fully with the Committee and the Panel.

6. Decided to remain actively seized of the matter.
